ai-writing.title: AI Writing Assistant
ai-writing.description: A browser extension that helps with writing clearer, more concise text. Uses AI to suggest improvements without changing your voice.

task-manager.title: Minimal Task Manager
task-manager.description: Ultra-lightweight task manager with focus on simplicity and keyboard shortcuts. No accounts, no cloud sync, just local tasks.

snippet-manager.title: Code Snippet Manager
snippet-manager.description: VS Code extension for saving, organizing and reusing code snippets with smart context detection.
